comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content:
PALMER, Alexander Mitchell, (1872 - 1936)
Representative (Democrat) from PA, 1909-1915
Unsuccessful Senate candidate
Had appointments during Wilson's presidency, including Atttorney General from 1919-1921.

comment.author: 22574121@N06
comment._content: We might want to mention the first Red Scare, also known as the Palmer raids: chnm.gmu.edu/courses/hist409/red.html
